action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: an adult elephant and a baby elephant standing on grass.
continue

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: two elephants standing in the dirt with trees in the background.
continue

This is my DESCRIPTION: an adult elephant and a baby elephant standing on grass.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: is the baby elephant standing on its own or is it next to the adult elephant?
continue

This is my DESCRIPTION: two elephants standing in the dirt with trees in the background.
QUESTION: is the baby elephant standing on its own or is it next to the adult elephant? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
ANSWER: next to the adult elephant.
continue
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: are there any trees in the background of the image?

ANSWER: next to the adult elephant.
QUESTION: are there any trees in the background of the image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
ANSWER: yes.
continue

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
Same image.
abort, first word: Same
